attributes.action: For children to be able to go on holiday in school times without fines
attributes.additional_details: So that children can have a normal holiday without stress and not having to be depressed
attributes.background: We want to be able to take children on holiday within school days without getting fined as the prices during holidays are way to high and some Children don’t get to go as their family could have financial issues

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Allow children 7 days holiday per year during term time without fines: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600111

Remove powers for local councils to fine when children are absent from school: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600483
